readme: Dynamic Queries (evaluated with selection) using All Music or Last FM tags.

dynamicQueries.name: Same All Music / Last FM genres
dynamicQueries.query: (ALBUM GENRE ALLMUSIC IS #ALBUM GENRE ALLMUSIC#) OR (ALBUM GENRE LAST.FM IS #ALBUM GENRE LAST.FM#)

dynamicQueries.name: Same All Music / Last FM moods
dynamicQueries.query: (ALBUM MOOD ALLMUSIC IS #ALBUM MOOD ALLMUSIC#) OR (ALBUM THEME ALLMUSIC IS #ALBUM THEME ALLMUSIC#)
